entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
